title: Mordekaiser op with sheen?
body: I got Mordekaiser in an aram match and after i build Trinity force i could literally 1 shot the enemy team Tristana with the sheen procing on my 3rd Q and i wasn't even fed.

replies.body: i usually rush trinity then go rylais, steraks then rageblade

Phadge
Tri force
Steraks 
these are always the first items i get
Mordekaiser's base damage is really high so sheen proc hurts a lot.
Oh damn I gotta try this :3
